title: A speech, of Colonell Edward Leigh, as it was delivered by himselfe to the honourable House of Commons, upon occasion of presenting a Stafford-shire petition: as also the petition it selfe, presented by the same colonell, and divers other gentlemen of Stafford-shire, on Munday the thirtieth of Septem. 1644.
author: Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.
publisher: Printed by F. L. for Matthew Walbancke, at Grays-Inne-Gate,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
